config_ios.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app requires motion detection access to minimize battery consumption by accessing to your location information only when moving.
config_ios.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to track, validate and reward your trips.
config_ios.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: When tracking a trip, this app requires constant access to your location in order to track your position, even when the screen is off or the app is in the background.
